title: Introduction
content: Welcome to BrightMind AI! These Terms of Use outline the rules and regulations for the use of our website and services.

title: User Accounts, User Registration and Delivery of Services
content: To access our programs, users must register for an account. All information provided during registration must be accurate. Services will be delivered online as per the program selected.

title: Payment Terms and Refund Policy
content: All payments for programs must be made in advance. Refunds will only be provided under specific conditions outlined in our refund policy.

title: Use of Programs
content: Programs are strictly for educational purposes. Sharing login credentials or course content without permission is prohibited.

title: Educational Partners and Accreditation
content: We partner with top educational institutions to deliver our programs. Accreditation details vary by program and are listed in the program details.
